00037 /// writes data samples from a single rectangular region 
00038 class RegionSIC : public MSDataAnalyzer
00039 {
00040     public:
00041

00043     {

00046         enum RadiusUnits {RadiusUnits_Unknown, RadiusUnits_amu, RadiusUnits_ppm};

00048 
00049         Config(const std::string& args); 
00050     };
00051 
00052     RegionSIC(const MSDataCache& cache, const Config& config);
00053 
00054     /// \name MSDataAnalyzer interface
00055     //@{
00056     virtual void open(const DataInfo& dataInfo);

00059                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;

00062                         const Spectrum& spectrum);

00065     //@}
